==Trivia==
===Etymology=== 
* ''{{w|Ajaw|K'uhul Ajaw}}'', also written ''Kul Ahaw'' means "Divine Lord" in Mayan. It was the title of the Classic Mayan "king" of a specific city-state.
** ''Kul Ahaw'' or ''Chul Ahau'' is a variation of ''K'uhul Ahaw''.
